features: THE PERFECT PAIR. Most people know the benefits of vitamin D, but many don’t realize that vitamin D NEEDS vitamin K2 to maximize benefits. If you’re fighting a vitamin D deficiency, you need to supplement Vitamin K2 as well. Zhou’s K2+D3 has you covered.

BONE SUPPORT. The ‘sunshine vitamin’ D3 helps your body absorb calcium while vitamin K2 (as MK-7, the form of K2 with the highest bioavailability) directs calcium to your bones instead of joints and arteries, where too much calcium could be problematic.

HEALTHY HEART FORMULA. Calcification occurs when calcium has been absorbed by the body, but deposited in arteries instead of bones. This premium formula helps support the proper absorption and distribution of calcium to help support a healthy heart.

ONLY THE BEST. Just one small, easy-to-swallow veggie capsule of K2+D3 per day provides 5000 IU of D3 and 90 mcg of K2 as MK-7, helping you support strong bones, a healthy cardiovascular system, and a strong immune system.

BASED IN THE HEART OF UTAH. At Zhou, we use only the highest-quality ingredients in a facility following Good Manufacturing Practices. Plus, we test everything at our lab in Utah, so you can be confident that you're fueling your body with the very best.
body.description: D3 + K2 is your go-to vitamin D supplement to support your immune system, heart, bones, muscles and mood. Vitamin D3 is THAT important, and it needs vitamin K2 to maximize all those benefits. With an estimated 1 billion people worldwide experiencing vitamin D deficiencies, supplementing is an effective solution—especially if you get less sun exposure during those winter months. Our premium formulation packs a punch with 125 mcg per serving and the most bioavailable form of K2 available (MK-7).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Two Essential Nutrients D3 + K2 is your go-to vitamin D supplement to support immune health, mood, heart, bones and muscles. A critical pairing, D3 and K2 work together to maximize benefits. Max-Strength Formula With one veggie capsule, you get 625% of the recommended daily value of vitamin D3 and 90 mcg of vitamin K2 as MK-7, the form of K2 with the highest bioavailability. Proper Calcium Absorption Vitamin D3, or the sunshine vitamin, helps your body absorb calcium while vitamin K2 directs calcium to your bones instead of joints and arteries. Mood & Immune Support Along with supporting heart and bone health, D3 + K2 also offers mood support and helps support a strong immune system. That’s a whole lot of goodness!

We keep it simple with two essential nutrients in one convenient, easy-to-take capsule. Zhou Nutrition D3 + K2 Capsules provide just the right amount of each essential vitamin to maximize the benefits to your bones, mood, heart, and immune system. Vitamin D helps support the proper absorption of calcium that we all know is so important as we age.* Without D3, you may be missing out on benefits from the calcium in your diet. While vitamin D ensures that calcium is absorbed, vitamin K2 helps support your body in directing it to areas such as your bones, so it can be put to good use.* Without proper calcium directing, the calcium absorbed may be deposited in the arteries, where it can lead to calcification or other issues.* Vitamins D3 and K2 are truly the perfect pair.

Vitamin D3 Each capsule is packed with 125 mcg of vitamin D3, or 625% of the daily recommended value, in order to support immune health and calcium absorption. Vitamin K2 While D3 is important for calcium absorption, vitamin K2 helps make sure the calcium gets to the right place. Our formula contains 90 mcg of vitamin K2 to help calcium absorb into the bones rather than the arteries. Vegetarian Formula Our scientists thoughtfully formulated our capsules to be vegetarian friendly so everyone can get the benefits of D3 + K2.

What are D3 + K2 Capsules? D3 + K2 is your go-to supplement for helping vitamin D inadequacies. Vitamin D3 is the same bioactive form of vitamin D you get from the sun’s UVB rays while K2 (as MK-7) is delivered in a bioavailable form.* What are the signs of a vitamin D deficiency? Signs of a vitamin D deficiency can include: feeling down more than is usual, achy bones, difficulty thinking clearly and fatigue.‡ Who may benefit from taking D3 + K2 Capsules? It is estimated that 8% of the U.S. population is at risk for Vitamin D deficiency.† D3 + K2 may be helpful for anyone experiencing said vitamin D deficiency. Those most prone to a vitamin D deficiency include: older adults, restrictive diets, darker skin tones, and overweight individuals.‡ Why are D3 + K2 Capsules effective? Vitamin D3 and vitamin K2 work together to help support heart, muscle, immune, and bone support, proper calcium absorption, and mood.* Bottom line, vitamins D3 and K2 are truly the perfect pair. How often do I use D3 + K2 Capsules? Take one D3 + K2 Capsule daily for best results. * These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. † Looker AC, Johnson CL, Lacher DA, et al. Vitamin D status: United States, 2001–2006. NCHS data brief, no 59. Hyattsville, MD: National Center for Health Statistics. 2011. ‡ “Vitamin D Deficiency: Symptoms & Treatment.” Cleveland Clinic, my.clevelandclinic.org/health/articles/15050-vitamin-d--vitamin-d-deficiency.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars K2+D3 has alleviated my sciatica very well
reviews.reviewText: I've just started using this brand of K2-D3. Out of 1500+ reviews, a high 86% are five-stars and another 10% four-stars. That speaks highly for its quality and value. For about 8 months now I've been ingesting various brands of K2 and D3, some combined and some separate, both pills and a liquid -- you use a few drops in the mouth and let it absorb. I believe that form helps it work more quickly.I've spent a lot of time in research on the value of Vitamin D3-K2, and my conclusion and experience are very positive.Vitamin D (specifically D3, the form you get from the sun) is essential for proper calcium absorption. Without D3, you may be missing out on benefits from the calcium in your diet.Vitamin K2 While vitamin D ensures calcium is absorbed, vitamin K2 (specifically as MK-7, the most bioavailable form) directs it to bones instead of arteries, where calcification or other issues could occur.Eight months ago the orthopedic doctor told me I need a double-knee replacement since both knees were bone on bone. That's very painful and makes it difficult to walk. The MRI also showed severe problems in my lower back that caused severe sciatica. The doctor said he couldn't guarantee surgery would solve that problem, and he recommended injections every 5 to 6 months. I'm glad to report that after 8 months of K2-D3 my sciatica is hardly noticeable. And my knees are better too, although I plan X-rays next month to see if cartilage has really built up. I am my best guinea pig and experiment on myself through natural means. This supplement of K2-D3 is one of those natural means.

reviews.reviewText: K2 helps the body to absorb vitamin D. Nice that I can get both in one dose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been using Zhou D3+K2 5000 IU for years. I take them daily due to a lab test that revealed I had almost no vitamin D. I was tired, my back and hips were always achy, and I wasn't sleeping well due to the achiness. Also, have the beginnings of osteoporosis. In general, my body felt old and I was in my 50's. I'm an active hiker/walker and thought I wouldn't be able to keep this up the way things were going. The doctor prescribed 5000 of vitamin D daily. I thought that was a lot, but when I thought about it, I don't go out in the sun unless I'm covered up and I wearing sunscreen. I am lactose intolerant and don't get calcium from dairy products either.The prescription vitamin D was pricey and not covered by my insurance. But after 2 weeks of taking vitamin D3, I had no achy back or hips, was sleeping better, and felt good.I stopped the prescription vitamin D and found this one with some research. So glad I found it. Still feeling great.I do have to say that I didn't take it for about 2 weeks, maybe 3, life happens. And the backache/hip ache, and tiredness came back. Started taking D3+K2 and felt better again. Lab results came up normal for me, so I'm happy. I never knew vitamin D could make a difference in how my body feels. Anyway, 65 now, feel great, still actively hiking, walking, cooking, and entertaining. Love life!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Take 2 caosules every day. Works for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars excellent, works great for me.
reviews.reviewText: i started taking 5000btu instead of 2000btu a couple months ago and started noticing something was not right, was starting to feel lazy/tired everyday again and was having bone aches out of the blue too. finally decided last week either i got a dud product or i should be using K2 like i read i should be in the first place but, didn't do so because my doctor did not tell me i needed to do so.after looking at other brands, i chose this brand because of the MK7, good reviews and price was decent so if it didn't work for me, than no big lost. well i don't know if it is because these are in powder form but, i swear these work better for me than the oil versions ever did, i felt instantly back to not feeling excessively tired after only two days of using these! i changed nothing else in my daily routine so hoping that it is not just coincidence that i felt normal today and that this product really is making me feel myself again.
